summary: Hornussen is a municipality of the district of Laufenburg in the canton of Aargau in Switzerland.
full_text: Hornussen is an indigenous Swiss sport. The sport gets its name from the puck which is known as a "Hornuss"  or "Nouss". When hit, it can whizz through the air at up to 300 km/h and create a buzzing sound.
title: Hornussen
